Description: The name of the investigation that teachers are currently working on
a list of additional properties related to the event (see below)
The name of the CLUE problem
The name of the section the event relates to (e.g. if creating a tile in a section document), or that the user has open (if any)
Random string which changes with every session--if they exit the application and re-enter it, this string changes
authed, "dev", "test", "demo". To see only events for logged-in users, you can filter for “authed.”
a unique identifier generated by the system for every class the teacher creates
Timestamp of the event (currently generated from the browser)
The id number of the user who initiated the event
The unique pathway of the problem file pathway
The navigation tab that the student has left open
This indicates whether teachers are currently using the “dashboard” view or the “workspace” view.
